title: Diving into the internals of Gem packaging
description:
Package managers are indispensible to most modern languages. Package managers have allowed developers to create and distribute building blocks that can be used to bootstrap complex web applications. In this post we will dive into the internals of Rubygems, the Ruby programming language’s package manager.
Any package manager has a simple mission: take code separated into a module and convert it into a format that can be easily distributed and installed in a number of different environments

title: Mutation Testing: A Tale of Two Suites
description: In January of 2020 Etsy engineering embarked upon a highly anticipated initiative. For years our frontend engineers had been using a JavaScript test framework that was developed in house. It utilized Jasmine for assertions and syntax, PhantomJS for the test environment, and a custom, built-from-scratch test runner written in PHP. This setup no longer served […]

title: What the interns have wrought, 2020 edition
